name: Simple Marble Maze
description:
This is a simple 3D marble maze game with various obstacles and collectibles. You can use WASD on your keyboard to navigate the marble through the maze. Upon starting each level, a timer will start to count down from 40 seconds, and extra time can be gained through collecting hourglass-shaped collectibles.

There are three levels in total: 

  • The first level: a very basic simple marble maze; 
  • The second level: a horizontal elevator and hourglass-shaped collectible are introduced, each hourglass could provide additional 5 seconds to the count down; 
  • The third level: a vertical elevator and black obstacles that will lead to "death" are added.

 Finish all three levels to check out the special video!
